## TxBuilder.setAuxiliaryData() method

Sets the auxiliary data for the transaction and updates the transaction's auxiliary data hash.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAuxiliaryData(auxiliaryData: AuxiliaryData): TxBuilder;
```
